name: expulsion
content:
expulsion noun [C or U]
(MAKE LEAVE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(the act of) forcing someone, or being forced, to leave a school, organization, or country: expulsion from They threatened him with expulsion from school.expulsion of This is the second expulsion of a club member this year.

(AIR/LIQUID)
(the act of) forcing air or liquid out of something
